name: 2024 13th International Conference on Software and Computing Technologies
content: Publications: International Journal of Computer Theory and Engineering (IJCTE, ISSN: 1793-8201), which will be indexed by Scopus (Since August 2022), CNKI, Google Scholar, Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, Crossref, ProQuest, EBSCO, and INSPEC. Journal of Software (JSW, eISSN: 1796-217X), which will be indexed by DBLP, EBSCO, Inspec, CNKI, etc.
